actions.name: list-voices
actions.description: Get the list of available voices for text-to-speech

actions.name: text_to_speech
actions.description: Converts input text into speech using Murf AI.

actions.name: translateText
actions.description: Translate one or more texts to the target language.

actions.name: voice-changer-convert
actions.description: Convert an input audio file to a different voice using Murf Voice Changer.
